trans-unit.source: Represents either an entity, entity stub or relationship.
trans-unit.target: 代表實體、實體虛設常式或關聯性。

trans-unit.source: No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要更新的內容，請不要在這裡新增資料。

trans-unit.source: Accepts the current values as original values.
trans-unit.target: 接受目前值當做原始值。

trans-unit.source: The detached object that has updated values to apply to the object.
trans-unit.target: 所中斷連結的物件，其中具有要套用至物件的更新值。

trans-unit.source: <c>currentEntity</c> can also be the object’s entity key.
trans-unit.target: <c>currentEntity</c> 也可以是物件的實體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current values of the entry to match the property values of a supplied object.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目的目前值，以符合所提供物件的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The detached object that has original values to apply to the object.
trans-unit.target: 具有要套用至物件之原始值的已中斷連結物件。

trans-unit.source: <c>originalEntity</c> can also be the object’s entity key.
trans-unit.target: <c>originalEntity</c> 也可以是物件的實體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Sets the original values of the entry to match the property values of a supplied object.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目原始值，以符合所提供物件的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> value to set for the <see cref="P:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State" /> property of the entry.
trans-unit.target: 要對項目的 <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> 屬性所設定的 <see cref="P:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Changes state of the entry to the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 將項目狀態變更成指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values of the object or relationship associated with this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 相關聯之物件或關聯性的目前屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord" /> that contains the current values of the object or relationship associated with this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord" />，其中包含與這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 相關聯之物件或關聯性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: Marks an entity as deleted.
trans-unit.target: 將實體標記為已刪除。

trans-unit.source: Gets the entity object.
trans-unit.target: 取得實體物件。

trans-unit.source: The entity object.
trans-unit.target: 實體物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the entity key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定實體金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The entity key.
trans-unit.target: 實體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase" /> for the object or relationship.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件或關聯性的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase" /> for the object or relationship.
trans-unit.target: 物件或關聯性的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase" /> 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of an object’s properties that have changed since the last time <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> was called.
trans-unit.target: 傳回自從上一次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> 以來已經變更之物件屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection of names as string.
trans-unit.target: 做為字串之名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updatable version of original values of the object associated with this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 相關聯之物件的可更新原始值版本。

trans-unit.source: The updatable original values of object data.
trans-unit.target: 物件資料的可更新原始值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Uses DetectChanges to determine whether or not the current value of the property with the given name is different from its original value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DetectChanges 來判斷有指定名稱之屬性的目前值是否與其原始值不同。

trans-unit.source: Note that this may be different from the property being marked as modified since a property which has not changed can still be marked as modified.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這可能不同於被標示為已修改的屬性，因為未變更的屬性仍可能被標示為已修改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property has changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性已經變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For complex properties, a new instance of the complex object which has all the same property values as the original instance is not considered to be different by this method.
trans-unit.target: 為複雜的屬性，含有與原始執行個體的屬性值完全相同的複雜物件的新執行個體是不被視為不同由這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> represents a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 是否表示關聯性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> represents a relationship; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 代表關聯性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the read-only version of original values of the object or relationship.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件或關聯性的唯讀版原始值。

trans-unit.source: The read-only version of original values of the relationship set entry or entity.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性集項目或實體的原始值的唯讀版本。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to change.
trans-unit.target: 要變更的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Rejects any changes made to the property with the given name since the property was last loaded, attached, saved, or changes were accepted.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕上次接受載入、附加、儲存或變更屬性後，對指定名稱之屬性進行的任何變更。

trans-unit.source: The orginal value of the property is stored and the property will no longer be marked as modified.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的原始值已儲存，且該屬性將不會再標記為已修改。

trans-unit.source: If the result is that no properties of the entity are marked as modified, then the entity will be marked as Unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果是實體的任何屬性會標示為已修改，實體將會不標示為未變更。

trans-unit.source: Changes to properties can only rejected for entities that are in the Modified or Unchanged state.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕實體處於已修改] 或 [未變更狀態只能變更的內容。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method for entities in other states (Added, Deleted, or Detached) will result in an exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 其他狀態 （已加入、 刪除或 Detached） 中的實體呼叫這個方法會導致擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Rejecting changes to properties of an Unchanged entity or unchanged properties of a Modifed is a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕未變更實體的屬性或修改的不變的屬性變更為無作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> instance for the object represented by entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目所表示之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the object or relationship to modify.
trans-unit.target: 設定要修改的物件或關聯性的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified property as modified.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的屬性標記為已修改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The name of the top-level object property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 變更中最上層物件屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The complex object that contains the property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 包含變更中屬性的複雜物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property on the complex object that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 變更中複雜物件之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a complex property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知複雜屬性已經變更。

trans-unit.source: The name of the complex property.
trans-unit.target: 複雜屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The complex object that contains the property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 包含變更中屬性的複雜物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property on the complex object that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 變更中複雜物件之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a complex property has a pending change.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知複雜屬性具有暫止的變更。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更之實體屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知屬性已經變更。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 變更中實體屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a property has a pending change.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知屬性具有暫止的變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityState" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />。
